ISSUE.TITLE: Cannot read property 'readyState' of null
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: `Cannot read property 'readyState' of null` seems because `now-cli` still gets `missing-files` after upload: https://github.com/zeit/now-cli/blob/11.2.9/src/providers/sh/util/index.js#L301 and https://github.com/zeit/now-cli/blob/11.2.9/src/providers/sh/commands/deploy/deploy.js#L811 and https://github.com/zeit/now-cli/blob/11.2.9/src/providers/sh/commands/deploy/deploy.js#L904

COMMIT.MESSAGE: retry createDeploy if files are missing. addresses #1463
